text: economic hubs across Tower Hamlets. g. The benefits of the new Elizabeth line, including the stations at Whitechapel and Canary Wharf, and other transport schemes will act as a further catalyst for investment and economic growth in the borough. 10.5 Securing infrastructure delivery to protect and strengthen public services: a. Tower Hamlets will meet the duties to deliver essential physical, digital, community, and green infrastructure, linked to effective infrastructure planning and delivery including through the securing of obligations through Section 106 Agreements. b. The timely provision of sufficient infrastructure, optimised capacity and densities to meet current and future needs will be secured, taking account of the cumulative impact of future development, especially in deficient areas.
